pages.md:
# Miscellaneous

| Problem                                                   | Solution                                                                                                                                                  |
|-----------------------------------------------------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| **The camera is unresponsive.**                           | - **Temporary camera malfunction:** Remove and reinsert the battery (ðŸ“– 32).                                                                               |
|                                                           | - **The battery is exhausted:** Charge the battery or insert a fully-charged spare battery (ðŸ“– 36).                                                        |
|                                                           | - **The camera is connected to a wireless LAN:** End the connection.                                                                                      |
|                                                           | - **The controls are locked:** Press and hold the **MENU/OK** button to unlock the controls (ðŸ“– 15, 17).                                                   |
| **The camera does not function as expected.**             | Remove and reinsert the battery (ðŸ“– 32). If the problem persists, contact your Fujifilm dealer.                                                           |
| **Motion in the viewfinder or monitor appears jerky rather than smooth.** | When **NORMAL** is selected for **PERFORMANCE**, the frame rate will drop if no operations are performed for a set period. The normal frame rate will be restored after you operate camera controls (ðŸ“– 231). |
| **No sound.**                                             | Adjust the volume (ðŸ“– 205).                                                                                                                               |
| **Pressing the Q button does not display the quick menu.**| **TTL-LOCK is active:** End TTL-LOCK (ðŸ“– 153).                                                                                                            |

rows: - **Temporary camera malfunction:** Remove and reinsert the battery (ðŸ“– 32).
- **The battery is exhausted:** Charge the battery or insert a fully-charged spare battery (ðŸ“– 36).
- **The camera is connected to a wireless LAN:** End the connection.
- **The controls are locked:** Press and hold the **MENU/OK** button to unlock the controls (ðŸ“– 15, 17).
**The camera does not function as expected.**
Remove and reinsert the battery (ðŸ“– 32). If the problem persists, contact your Fujifilm dealer.
**Motion in the viewfinder or monitor appears jerky rather than smooth.**

When **NORMAL** is selected for **PERFORMANCE**, the frame rate will drop if no operations are performed for a set period. The normal frame rate will be restored after you operate camera controls (ðŸ“– 231).
**Pressing the Q button does not display the quick menu.**
